metadata.synopsis: Disillusioned L.A. cop Max Dire (Mario Van Peebles) is having trouble at work and at home. After enigmatic officer Adam Garou (Bruce Martyn Payne) invites him into a secret task force that uses a serum to give its members the ability to become powerful werewolves, Max's initial skepticism gives way to a newfound vigor for crime fighting. But when Max's friend Casey Spencer (Patsy Kensit) is killed, Garou's motives are revealed to be less than pure -- and Max must confront his former mentor.

reviews: So-so amalgam of cop procedural and werewolf mayhem.
